recipeCategories.name: Cookies
recipeCategories.description: Drop cookies, cut-out cookies, bar cookies

flourRecommendations.name: Gluten-Free 1:1 Blend
tips: Use same amount as wheat flour
No additional binders needed
Let cookies cool completely before removing from pan
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: Best for beginners and when you want guaranteed results

flourRecommendations.name: Almond Flour
tips: Use same amount as wheat flour
Add 1/4 tsp xanthan gum per cup for binding
Cookies will be slightly chewier
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: When you want nutty flavor and don't mind denser texture

flourRecommendations.name: Coconut Flour
tips: Use 1/4 the amount of wheat flour
Add 1 extra egg per 1/4 cup flour
Let batter rest 5 minutes before baking
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: When you want high-fiber cookies with coconut flavor

recipeCategories.name: Bread
recipeCategories.description: Sandwich bread, artisan bread, dinner rolls

flourRecommendations.name: Gluten-Free Bread Flour
tips: Use same amount as wheat flour
Add 1 tsp xanthan gum per cup
Let rise in warm place
Bake until internal temp reaches 200°F
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: Best for sandwich bread and dinner rolls

flourRecommendations.name: Custom Flour Blend
tips: Mix: 40% rice flour, 30% sorghum, 20% starch, 10% protein flour
Add 1 tsp xanthan gum per cup
Let dough rest 30 minutes before shaping
Use bread machine or stand mixer
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: When you want full control and are willing to experiment

flourRecommendations.name: Gluten-Free 1:1 Blend
tips: Use same amount as wheat flour
Mix dry ingredients well
Don't overmix batter
Let cool completely before frosting
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: Best for beginners and when you want guaranteed results

flourRecommendations.name: Almond Flour
tips: Use same amount as wheat flour
Add 1/4 tsp xanthan gum per cup
Reduce sugar by 1/4 cup
Bake at 25°F lower temperature
flourRecommendations.whenToUse: When you want moist, dense cake with nutty flavor

flourRecommendations.name: Gluten-Free Pizza Flour
tips: Use same amount as wheat flour
Add 1 tsp xanthan gum per cup
Let dough rest 30 minutes
Roll between parchment paper

flourRecommendations.name: Custom Flour Blend

Add 1 tsp xanthan gum per cup
Let dough rest 30 minutes
Use wet hands to shape
